metadata.description: The name of the subnet where the hardware station should be deployed
The VNET Id where the hardware station should be deployed. This can be found on the 'Properties' page of the VNET blad in the Azure portal
The name or names of the hardware station VMs. This parameter is an array and can accept multiple, comma separated values
The local admin username on the hardware station VM(s)
The key vault Id and secret name storing the local admin password for the hardware station VM(s)
The FQDN to which the hardware station VM(s) should be joined
This parameter is optional. The distinguished name of an Active Directory OU where the hardware stations AD objects should reside
The domain admin or domain join service account username that should be used to join the hardware station VM(s) to the domain
The key vault Id and secret name storing the domain admin or domain join service account password being used to join the hardware station VM(s) to the domain
The key vault Id where the hardware station SSL certificate is being stored
The key vault certificate URL for the hardware station SSL certificate. This can be found in the certificate properties under the 'Secret Identifier' field
The key vault Id and secret name storing the SAS URL for the 'HWSDeployment.ps1' script
